title: Law Enforcement - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/17/19
itunes:title: Law Enforcement - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/17/19
description:
George Noory, police training advocate Ron Barber and retired Las Vegas police officer Randy Sutton explore the dangers that police officers deal with in the line of duty, whether police are respected like they were in the past, and public misconceptions about police officers.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:summary: A look at the current state of police in America, and the challenges they face daily.
